title: Mailvox: The War on Fertility
author: VD
content_html:
The Covid-19 vaxxes were not the only front opened by the global depopulationists. The medical community has been subverted in more ways than one, especially with regards to pediatricians and OB/GYNs.

My wife was found to be low on estrogen, and needed to supplement hormones. This is usually done in menopause, although some medical histories, such as my wife’s, make it necessary in younger years too.
The OB/GYN wrote her a prescription for an estradiol-based supplement, but it was one that included Levonorgestrel during the fertile days of the cycle.

Levonorgestrel is the active ingredient in the “Plan B” / “Morning After” pill.

This OB/GYN knew that my wife wants to have children, and blew off her concerns. The Levornogestrel does have its uses in menopausal women, of which my wife is not one. The same pharmaceutical company sells the same estradiol supplement without the Levornogestrel in it, and yet the OB/GYN prescribed the Levornogestrel. Before this specific diagnosis, the same OB/GYN also tried to get her on hormonal contraception, using all kinds of horror scenarios to make his “case”.

This is not unique, many OB/GYNs recommend, even push the pill for everything a young woman is experiencing. These “doctors” appear to be part of the war on fertility.

I would not take one single thing at face value from any doctor anymore. They aren’t even “doctors” in the sense that we understand the term; these are not people who have taken the Hippocratic Oath or are sworn to do no harm. Patient health is not their primary concern, so be cautious when utilizing their expertise and always make sure that what you’re being advised, and what you’re being prescribed, actually makes sense given your medical condition and personal situation.

You have to be your own advocate now. You cannot trust someone simply because he wears a white coat and calls himself a doctor. So did Dr. Mengele, after all.
